name: GPEX
description: "The GPEX wallet features cross-chain compatibility to support various cryptocurrencies, along with inter-chain technology to provide fast payment transactions to partner platforms. Users can swap their unused loyalty points, reward points, airline miles, store points, etc, (“Brand Points”) into the GPEX Wallet. The wallet supports an internal stable coin, GPX the listed coin, as well as other partner tokens for their games. The GPEX Platform was created to bring value to forgotten assets by expanding their usages outside their initial points system and issuer. We seek to grow the market by introducing new users to the world of blockchain, cryptocurrency, and NFT. "
